welcomeMessage: Welcome to the AI Video Generator
connectingToBackendMessage: Please wait while we establish a connection. Retrying automatically.
lastFrameNotSupportedTooltip: Last frame not supported by this model
pasteImageTooltip: Click to focus, then paste image from clipboard
pasteLastFrameImageFromClipboardButtonTi: Paste Last Frame Image from Clipboard
lastFrameNotSupportedMessage: Last frame images are not supported by the 'veo-3.0-generate-preview' model.
promptRequiredForImageGeneration: Prompt is required to generate an image.
imageGenerationFeaturePlaceholder: Image generation from prompt is a placeholder. No actual image will be generated yet.
aspectRatio9x16Warning: 9:16 ratio is not supported by this model and has been reset to 16:9.
errorMessageGeneric: Something is wrong! Please check your prompt and settings.
videoTagNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
videoDataUnavailable: Video data is unavailable for this completed task.
dreamViewPlaceholderHint: Enter a prompt in the sidebar and click Generate to create your video!
confirmDeleteTaskMessage: Are you sure you want to delete task {{taskId}}? This will also delete associated video and thumbnail files.
errorNoImageOnClipboard: No image found on clipboard. Please ensure you have copied an image.
errorTaskCompletedNoUri: Task completed by backend but no video URI or local path returned after retries.
createVideoPlaceholder: Select or add a clip to the track to play.
createClipTrackPlaceholder: Click tasks in history to add clips here.
errorNoClipsToCreateVideo: No clips in the track to create a video.
createVideoInitiatedMessage: Video creation initiated. Check history for progress.
errorMaxClipsReached: Maximum {{maxClips}} clips allowed in the track.
errorInvalidMusicFileType: Invalid music file type. Please upload an MP3.
musicGenerationNotImplemented: Music generation feature is not yet implemented.
musicGenerationFailedGeneric: Music generation failed. Please try again.
audioTagNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
errorStartMusicGenerationGeneric: Could not start music generation. Please try again.
errorMusicTaskCompletedNoUri: Music generation completed, but the music file is not available.
errorPollMusicTaskStatusFailed: Failed to get music task status. Please check manually or try again.
errorMusicFileTooLargeAPI: Uploaded music file is too large. {{message}}
errorUploadMusicFileNoPath: Music file uploaded, but no path was returned from the server.
errorUploadMusicFileGeneric: Failed to upload music file. Please try again.
musicGenerationComingSoonMessage: Music generation feature is coming soon!
videoEditingUnderDevelopmentNoticeBody: The video editing (Weave) mode is currently under active development. You may experience performance issues or encounter bugs.
videoEditingUnderDevelopmentNoticeSugges: This feature is CPU intensive. If you find it very slow, please consider upscaling your server resources.
